Name: The Battles of Spwak
About the game: Tired of easy and repetitive Turn-Based Battles? Tired of missing attacks? Tired of never using States? Look no further! For this is The Battles of Spwak ! Forced to become an Adventurer for circunstances out of his control, Spwak, the Protagonist and his companions must face dozens of challenging Battles. Resilient enemies. Dangerous foes. Nasty opponents. You name it, they will face it. Can you make them thrive, regardless of the adversities? Even in the Challenges and Survival Modes? Meanwhile, have fun with their Story. Features Highly challenging and often strategic Turn-Based Battles 100 Unique Battles 5 Different Party Members 96 Different kinds of Enemies 47 Usable Skills Retry Feature - Restart the Battle in a heartbeat Observation Feature - See your Enemies' strengths and weaknesses All your Skills are 100% accurate Over than 20 hours of gameplay (all Modes included) Challenges Mode - Can you complete all of them? Survival Mode - How far can you go? Humorous names and funny dialogue 17 Achievements Controls Movement: Arrow Keys, Num Pad (2, 4, 6, 8), Left Click Action: Z, Enter, Space, Left Click Menu / Cancel: X, Esc, Num Pad (0), Right Click Dash / Walk: Shift
